<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Necromancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=929)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Defiling the natural order and spitting in the face of convention, the necromancer remains dutifully committed to understanding what forces await beyond the mortal boundaries of life and death.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Necromancer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=929)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 230</row>

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Stench of Decay** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The necromancer emits a scent of putrid rot in a 5-foot emanation. A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).

**Items**
[Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5), hooded robe, _scroll of [_spectral hand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=295)_, spellbook

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 58

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
light mace +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Wizard Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +13
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300)
- **2nd**
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)
- **3rd**
[Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 21, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Call of the Grave](/Spells.aspx?ID=522)

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn; **Effect** The necromancer expends the power stored in their mace. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

</column>
